headline: Citi Maintains Neutral Rating on Simon Property Group (SPG)
summary: Simon Property Group, Inc. (NYSE:SPG) is one of the most undervalued stocks. On June 17, Citi trimmed its price target on SPG from $185 to $170 while reiterating a Neutral rating on the stock. The company adjusted its 2025 funds from operations (FFO) estimate downward to $12.21 from the previous $12.52, adding the impact of […]
